About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment. Reference assistance available by mail. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3 and photographs.

About.Access: At least one week's advance notice of visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: Any record pertaining to the Eastern Goldfields of Western Australia i.e. mainly the following Goldfields - Coolgardie, East Coolgardie, North Coolgardie, North-east Coolgardie, Mt. Margaret, Dundas with some interest in Murchison and Yalgoo Goldfields. (1% in-house).

Contact.Street address: Boulder Municipal Power House Hamilton Street Boulder WA 6432
